      private void trade()

    • isActorInPossesion

      public boolean isActorInPossesion​(java.lang.String name, int playerThatBelongsTo)
      Validates that an actor is in possession of the client listed.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the actor.
      playerThatBelongsTo - Name of client to check if has possession of the actor
      Returns:
      True or false as to whether the client indeed has position of actor
